packsmith.TEXT: All sigils are kind of like... permissions of sorts.
All this one does is let you talk to me.
...Stop looking disappointed it's a high honor!

candle.TEXT: It's sufficient to light any space.
You'll likely be able to see things back home you  couldn't before

ascension.TEXT: Looks like a portal or something.
Not sure exactly what it does but.
It's attached itself to your wheel
Clicking on the wheel should tell you more.

emptiness.TEXT: A vague memory of a ANIMATION_NAME.
It's honestly kind of creepy that you have this.
Wearing this will amplify an emotion of your choice to a considerable degree.
To the point where it persists after death.
...You'd have to wear it though. Ew.

ritual.TEXT: A relic from hell, the ritual.
It represents a deal with the devil, though the devil happens to be dead.
So it's peculiar that this is working at all.
Maybe a new one spawned in.
The price to be paid is the spin speed of your wheel, so don't light too many candles.

hell.TEXT: Oh hey, it's the sigil of a blue baby.
Those things are the servants of Divine.
You could probably use this to get into heaven!
...actually there's no perm for that in here. Guess it's useless then.

sanddollar.TEXT: Usually you find these near the ocean, but you can find them fossilized everywhere in the sand.
You can now access the desert by clicking on the button in the center of Travel, then on Sandspace.
And once you enter the area once, you won't need this sigil to re-enter the area ever again.

zundanight.TEXT: That's a picture of the moon with å¤œ.
The Beast of the Night. She'll eat anything and everything She can get her hands on.
Not that either of us need to worry about that.

undercity.TEXT: It's said that all the fae live in the undercity.
It's quite a nice place. I think. I don't know. I don't leave this place.
This let's you get on the bus that goes there.

twins.TEXT: That's a rose, not the kind that talks though.
My sister's own that one as a pet. It's very weird.
They live down below. Be careful when talking to them
You don't want to get pricked.
